name: Artist: アシマ | Ashima artist's painting style
description:
アシマ(Ashima) Style LoRA

中文 | English

仿アシマ的作画风格的LoRA模型。

我好喜欢的画风！

权重建议值：1 (or 0.6~1.4)

基于模型：Anything-5RE

训练信息：筛选出共计172张原画（含裁剪图），迭代1032步，多分辨率迭代训练。

其他的一些建议：EasyNegative。

LoRA model with a drawing style inspired by Ashima.

I really love this art style!

Recommended weight value: 1 (or 0.6~1.4)

Based on the model: Anything-5RE

Training information: Selected a total of 172 original drawings (including cropped images), iterated for 1032 steps, and trained with multi-resolution iteration.

Some other suggestions: EasyNegative.
